names.english: clear heat and dry dampness decoction
names.commonEnglish: Clear Heat and Dry Dampness Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity and clears Damp-Heat from the Lower Jiao.
With Gan Cao, for toxic swellings and sores.
With Gan Cao and Xuan Shen, for sloughing ulcers from Heat toxicity.
With Xuan Shen, Dang Gui and Gan Cao, for suppurative inflammation of the legs.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and clears hot sores.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
With Jin Yin Hua, reduces obstruction and toxicity for swollen, painful sores and necrosis of surrounding tissue.
With Jin Yin Hua, Gan Cao and Xuan Shen, reduces swelling of abscesses and sores and alleviates pain.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat, soothes irritability, cools the Blood and reduces abscesses.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire and detoxifies.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin, drains Fire and relieves toxicity.
With Jin Yin Hua and Dang Gui, for gangrene of the fingers and toes.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
Invigorates the Blood, eliminates Blood Stasis, promotes the movement of Qi, opens the channels and collaterals to alleviate pain and reduces swelling.
Invigorates the Blood, circulates Qi and stops pain.
Tonifies the Spleen,augments Qi, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Jin Yin Hua, for Damp rashes or acne.
Clears Heat
Dries Dampness
Stops pain

symptoms: Swelling, distention, aching and pain of the affected fingers and/or toes
